mechanics.condition: Character reaches level 4 OR 8 OR 12 OR 16 OR 19
mechanics.outcome: Player chooses to increase one ability score by 2 OR two different ability scores by 1

mechanics.condition: The chosen ability score's new value would exceed 20
mechanics.outcome: The ability score cannot be increased above 20 using this feature

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
